transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello ha bhaiya main bol raha hun Bengal se.
Executive: Achcha ji ji ji boliye sir kaise hain aap?
Customer: Ha badhiya are maine na ek bar Agarwal wedding wale ki comment karwai thi.
Executive: Kiske payment karwai thi sir? process nahi hua tha Agarwal wedding maine kaha lakh mere fas gaye.
Executive: Ek minute sir ek minute rukiye Nannu Lal ha.

Customer: Ha boliye sir kiski payment karai thi?
Customer: Maine ek bar Agarwal wedding ki payment karwai thi aapko Agarwal wedding solution ki.
Executive: Solution ki lakh lakh rakh rakhe the mere.
Customer: Mera chal raha.
Executive: Aapka paisa rakha hua tha lakh ka.
Customer: Ha maine kaha lakh ka mal bech raha tha lekin lakh ki payment karwi nahi thi.
Executive: Ye kab ki baat hai sir?
Customer: Ye sir aaj se teen saal pehle ki baat hai teen saal pehle ki baat hai maine complaint bhi kahi thi India mart mein unki website bhi band kar di thi fir ek dam unki website.
Executive: Teen saal pehle ki baat hai sir ye teen saal pehle ki baat hai.
Customer: Teen saal pehle website bhi to band kar di thi na agar defaulter mein aap log blacklist bhi to karte ho na supplier payment nahi karta.
Executive: Ha ha humne to defaulter mein hi karte hain sir proper tarike se.
Customer: Ha to defaulter mein aap band karte ho na to maine do mahine baad fir se a gayi thi.

Executive: Theek hai to abhi aap kya chah rahe ho sir matlab ki kya hai kya hai? main apni comment reopen karwa raha hun na meri payment karwi nahi aaya uski website band rahe.
Executive: To aap ticket open karana chah rahe ho ki unhone unki company registered hai?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Okay but sir yahan par actually sabse bada main concern ye hai ki aapki hi service ka service expire ho chuka hai to hum complaint kaise usko register kar sakte hain? main na customer bhi to hun na bhai sahab meri bhi to comment hoti hai unki company India mart mein service hoti hai.
Executive: Nahi main aapki baat samajh gaya jaise ki unki company ka mujhe GST bata doge unki company ka aap mujhe detail bata doge ki ha ye company hai ye unka GST hai. aap logo ko bata diya are aap logo ko bata to diya bhai main do saal mein lagatar rate badha hua hai kam complete ho gaya minute le lo aap.
Customer: To sir aap purani sir teen saal purane wala jo aap bata rahe ho. maine pichle maine pichle saal main do saal pehle rate kam tha.
Customer: Pichle saal mera rate badha ke liya tha to is saal main kyu rate badha ke du.
Customer: Pichli bar maine 48000 ke hisab se maine paise diye the pichle se pichli bar are pichle saal maine 52000 ke hisab se paise diye ab main aapke hisab se 57000 ke hisab se paise du ab ye bhi dekho na.
Executive: Sir main aapki baat samajh gaya. kar lena bhai ha to aap team ko kaho na ki ek banda agar dekho renewal mein karwane ko tayar ho gaya 20 din se aapne baithe.
Customer: Sir aap ek minute sir ek minute main aapki bolte jate ho sir aap bolte jate ho ye nahi ki aap samne wale ka bhi kuch point suno lekin aap bolte nahi jate ho. company ka rate hai kya suna sir ek minute aapne kya suna aapke senior se aapke senior se baat hui wo keh raha hai company ne rate de rakha.
Executive: Sir ek minute sir aapki kis se baat aap mere abhi mere paas call aaya hai aapne mujhe bataya ki aapko ek complaint karna hai teen saal purana. dekhiye aap ab dusri topic mein chale gaye sir main abhi aapki baat ko bol raha hun aapne mujhe India mart mein koi Shubham hai daily phone karta hai mere ko.
Executive: Sir ek minute sir aapne abhi mujhe call kiya aapne customer care mein call kiya aapne mujhe bataya ki aapko na dekho main aapko na pura point baat karta hun jyada baat nahi karta same rate mein jab main renewal karwa lu.
Executive: To aapka main concern hai ki aapko renewal same price mein karna hai isliye aap wo teen saal purani baat utha rahe ho sir.
Customer: Nahi teen saal purani baat to konsi hai wo to Agarwal wedding ki hai wo to matter alag cheez hai wo to message alag hai aur renewal ka matter alag hai agar mera expire bhi hota India mart mein mera expire bhi hota India mart mein. to sir main aapko bata deta hun aapne India mart ke customer care mein call kiya ye proper recording line hai main aapko abhi bata deta hun aapki service ka end date 4 November tha wo cross kar chuka hai aapki company proper tarike se jo hai wo aapke free list ho chuki hai dusri cheez jo aapka renewal ka costing hai wo 75000 plus GST hai theek hai aap kahin bhi ja ke check kar sakte hain customer care mein dobara se call karke puch sakte hain 75000 plus GST hai sir and teesri cheez jo aap bol rahe hain ki aapko old price mein karana hai wo milna aap possible nahi hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai wo milna aapko possible nahi hai sir aur teesri cheez sir agar aap ye bol rahe hain ki teen saal purani wali complaint ye wo to sir wo teen saal purani wali jo aap complaint bol rahe ho us time aapko karni chahiye sir usi time aapko solve karni chahiye. maine us time bhi maine us time bhi main ek baat ko bhi nahi jyada khichunga main aapko simple sa bata raha hun main man liya ki agar aapke paas aaj ke date mein bhi wo prove hai ye sab kuch hai hum us company ka GST aap mujhe de do complaint ka sara detail de do hum dobara se bhi unke upar ticket khol sakte hain koi issue nahi hai agar wo company paid hai India mart mein wo company aaj bhi dikhai deti hai hum wo bhi kar sakte hain lekin dusri cheez agar wo cheez India mart consider karegi tab agar teen saal purani baat ko leke India mart sir main aapko abhi meri baat clear karne dijiye sir clear karne dijiye meri baat agar India mart us cheez ko consider karegi to us cheez ko jarur action legi aapki baton pe sir but pehli cheez sir aapne jo mujhse bola ki renewal aapko purane price mein karana hai renewal ka costing hai sir 75000 plus GST sir.
Customer: Ab iske regarding agar aap mere paas 57000 ka to kal bhi rate aaya tha mere paas.
Executive: 57 kahan rate aaya tha sir aap mujhe screenshot bhejiye agar mail mein bhi aaya hoga kahin bhi aaya hoga aap mujhe mail mein bhejiye. ye Shubham hai aapke yahan India mart mein koi Shubham hai aapka koi head officer hai pata nahi kaun hai head department se 57000 unhone rate.
Executive: Ek minute main number search kar raha hun aur main unko conference call mein leta hun theek hai aap line pe rahiye sir.

Executive: Sir maine Shubham ji ko call pe le liya hai aap baat kijiye.

Customer: Hello
Executive: Han ji
Executive: Ji bataiye sir kaise hain aap?
Customer: Badhiya bataiye ji meri ek payment aayi hui hai main aaj payment aayi hui hai iske baad aayegi payment mere paas mangalwar ko sir agar same rate mein aap karte ho 4000 aapke yahan par kya hai agar same meri jeb se nikale 54000 52000 plus GST main 52000 de raha hun aaj bhi.
Executive: Agar same theek hai nahi to send kar dijiye.
Executive: Sir 52000 to aap pehle bhi de rahe the 52000 to le hi nahi paunga sir main main price mera 75000 plus GST aapki end date bhi ja chuki hai waise bhi aapka catalog defaulter ho hi chuka hai sir mere paas.
Customer: Ho gaya usse koi fark nahi padta mere ko pehle bhi ho rakha mera.
Executive: Sir wo to sir aapki call hai aap bataiye sir aapne call transfer karai thi please bataiye mere se kya. ha dekho ji bol rahe the aisa koi rate nahi aaya aapke paas 57000 ka to maine bola 52000 ka check kar dijiye 57000 ka to koi rate hi nahi aaya.
Executive: 57000 sir 57000 jab diya tha tab to aapne nahi karaya na 15 se pehle 57 tha sir aap mane kahan hamari baat aap aap hi nahi man rahe the sir ab 57 wale bhi nahi hai sir. aap bhi nahi man rahe.
Executive: Han ji ha to bas wahi hai sir koi baat nahi main nahi man rahe to mat maniye sir.
Customer: Chalo theek hai ek na meri complaint aayi thi Agarwal wedding ke against usme mere lakh rakh rakhe. sir main aapki koi complaint entertain nahi kar paunga teen saal purani to waise bhi nahi kar paunga kyunki dekhiye main dekh leta hun baat nahi hai baat nahi hai baat suniye uski website band ho gayi thi mere ko aaj check kara aaj check karne me pata laga ki uski website reopen ho gayi hai. to sir to sir usne band ho gayi thi usi ha to usi reopen hui hai mere se bina confirm kare as a defaulter list mein gaya tha sir lakh rakh rakhe the as a customer ab ye mat socho ki ki koi company hai as a customer bhi aap action lte ho.
Executive: Sir hum action pe nahi hai sir.
Customer: Aap action mein nahi ho recorded line mere taraf se bhi hai.
Executive: To wahi keh raha hun sir ek bar main dekh leta hun aapko. ha ha ab to aapki to main wahi kehta hun na dhang se baat karo.
Executive: Kaise baat karu sir?
Customer: Maine wahi to kaha tha dhang se baat karo abhi to tum badli aapki. nahi aapne kuch bhi dekha.
Executive: Sir maine bola hi nahi kuch nahi dekhta sir aap customer customer bhi maine lakh bache hai India mart ke kya kehte hain. sir aapne kiye hain bilkul kiye hain sir bilkul kiye hain respect karta hun aapne kiye hain achchi baat hai sir main kab mana kar raha hun aapne nahi kiye. lekin aap main sir main aaram se hi baat kar raha hun aap bol rahe na ki dhang se baat karo sir main main dhang se hi baat kar raha hun. aapne keh diya tha koi complaint nahi hone ki teen saal baad bhi aapne koi aapne ye baat boli ki teen saal wali koi baat meri taraf se nahi hai. maine bola maine bola sir suniye aap sun lijiye pehle puri baat aap sunte nahi hain Mayank ji main ye keh raha hun ki wo entertain main kar paunga nahi kar paunga dekhna padega sir teen saal pehle kar paoge nahi kar paoge dekh lo aap theek hai theek hai na teen saal.
Customer: Teen saal purani baat hai ji aapki complaint. dijiye dijiye sir bhej dijiye details bhej dijiye. ha number bolo main aapko whatsapp kar raha. number mera aapke paas hai already. main aapko whatsapp kar raha bolo dijiye whatsapp ha kar do ye dekhiye hello dal diya bhej dijiye.
Customer: A gaya ek minute.

Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir aur dusra ek cheez aur hai sir isme ki aap mere ko bhej dijiyega details rest main koshish kar lunga lekin jaise aapne mere ko bataya ki sir aap as a buyer complaint kar rahe the as a buyer main take care nahi karta hun sir this is not my department ki main buyer supplier ki conflict take care karta hun ye mera department nahi hai sir aap bhej dijiye. to maine baat chal rahi ha ek cheez aur hai ab aap kya dekh loge aap yaani price me dekhoge ki scheme me dekhoge.
Executive: Price main samjha nahi sir main. yaani aapko abhi kuch kar raha hun main kuch dekh lunga aapko yaani price me dekhoge ki scheme me dekhoge agar main India mart se renewal karwata hun. sir price to sir 75000 plus GST ja chuka hai usse kam waise bhi possible nahi ho pa raha sir sir renewal pe hi to renewal pe hi to de rahe the hum log discount naye client ko to 75 pe le raha hun sir aap naye client ho mere liye sir aapki due date ja chuki hai koi baat nahi hai sir wo aapki marzi hai aap aap kitne me chah rahe ho.
Customer: Dekho ji agar 4000 kar lo 2000 bana lo bas. are sir main are sir ek cheez mujhe bataiye Mayank ji please mind mat kariyega bura mat maniyega aap sabji mandi mein thodi khade hain sir hum log aap aur main sir sabji mandi wali baat nahi hai main aap aise paise nahi le pa rahe na main aise karwa se paise aap ek cheez to bataiye aap ek baat suniye sir main pichle 14 din se aap hi ki sun raha tha sir aap ek cheez to bataiye 2000 4000 mein India mart amir garib ho jayegi aap amir garib ho jayegi 2000 4000 ki baat nahi hai main dekho aapke liye 4000 mujhe aap se 2000 jyada lene mein ya kam lene mein meri personally mujhe kuch benefit ho raha hoga sir aap samajhiye to sahi baat karunga ye to phone phone pe maine keh diya abhi to ke liye baat karni padegi aap pehle baat hi kar lijiye sir tab bataiyega mera price 75000 plus GST hai sir naye client ke liye yahi price hai aur aap naye client ho sir main bata raha hun 4 tarikh aapki last date thi.
Customer: Chalo theek hai theek hai na sir thank you so much thank you so much sir aap bhej dijiyega ji thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to reopen comment, payment not done.

- Wants renewal at the same price.

- Claims to have been quoted INR 57,000.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the renewal cost is INR 75,000 + GST.

- Executive stated old price is not possible.

- Executive offered to investigate the old complaint.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send details of old complaint.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, complaint, payment, price, gst
